actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (Clean Water Act) to authorize appropriations in each of fiscal years 1994-2001 for the construction of wastewater treatment works to provide water pollution control in or near the United States-Mexico border area.
short_title: U.S.-Mexico Border Water Pollution Control Act
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: U.S.-Mexico Border Water Pollution Control Act - Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to provide financial and other assistance to the Border Environment Cooperation Commission, Federal, State, or local governmental entities, and the International Boundary and Water Commission, United States and Mexico for planning, design, and construction of wastewater treatment works in the U.S.-Mexican border area. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: U.S.-Mexico Border Water Pollution Control Act

To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (Clean Water Act) to authorize appropriations in each of fiscal years 1994-2001 for the construction of wastewater treatment works to provide water pollution control in or near the United States-Mexico border area.
